1.content:
To-Love-Ru has many characters in it, and with it many different ways to change its cast. Here are a list of characters in the series that can be chosen as potential TF victims:

Rito Yuuki - our male protagonist. An average guy, he's not the smartest or most athletic person around, but he's a nice guy who cares for the people around him. However, he has been known to get a little riled up by the strange events that have recently surrounded his life, especially by Lala. He currently lives with his sister Mikan, with their parents making infrequent visits. His father works as a cartoonist.

Reference pictures: http://myanimelist.net/character/5510/Ri...


Lala Deviluke: the main heroine of the series, Lala is the eldest daughter of powerful alien parents (though her father, oddly enough, looks like a child to most people). She's cheerful and friendly, but is known to being occasionally ditsy and even clumsy. She is typically accompanied by Piko, a little robot of hers that resides either on her head or on her body. He enables her to be clothed, and when he falls off or gets tired Lala becomes naked. Needless to say, this happens somewhat often. She has two little sisters, Nana and Momo, as well as a bodyguard named Zastin.

Reference pictures: http://myanimelist.net/character/5511/La...


Haruna Sairenji: Rito's long-time crush, Haruna is a nice girl who is greatly respected by both the guys and girls of her school. She's deftly afraid of ghosts.

Reference pictures: http://myanimelist.net/character/5512/Ha...


Yui Kotegawa: a girl who meets Rito, Lala, and Haruna in their second year of high school. The student council president of her class in her first year of high school, she's a girl who believes in keeping order in things, and as a result has chastised Rito and Lala for what she considers "weird behavior". She has recently starting building up feelings for Rito.

Reference pictures: http://myanimelist.net/character/9530/Yu...

More characters on page 2!

11.content:
It was that time of year for young high school student Rito Yuuki: it was his birthday. To a typical family, it meant cake, presents, and maybe a nice dinner. And up until the last year or so, that would apply to Rito's family as well. However, after Lala came into his life, even ordinary events like simple housework and school festivals have gotten weird.

Unfortunately for Rito, his parents were too busy to meant their son on his birthday. This news made him, his sister, and Lala sad. Not one to see people unhappy, though, the pink-haired alien with a knack for inventions decided that maybe a little change in his life would make him feel better.

Asking Mikan to play along with her, Rito was guided with a blindfold to Lala's room, where the girl handed her friend a drink. He was hesitant at first, but from both pressure from Mikan, as well as Lala's cheerful remainder that "everything will be fine", he decided to give it a go. Lala just wanted him to be happy, right?

"Lala, I feel funny. Is something happening to me?" the blindfolded Rito asked his sister and not-quite-girlfriend.

"Um....", said Mikan. "Yes."

"Figures", sighed Rito.

Rito could feel himself diminishing in size, as well as feel his arms and legs beginning to converge. Something about it felt familiar, and within a few minutes time he was suddenly falling slowly to the ground, with Lala looking as excited as ever and Mikan giving an exasperated sigh.

His perspective had suddenly gone from being taller or at eye level with them, to far beneath them at their feet. He could still see fine, even smell, meaning his senses were more or less in tact, but he couldn't move. After a few moments of failing to do so, he saw Mikan lower her hand down towards him, and lifting him up soon after.

"You really do have bad luck, Rito... How do you keep having things like this happen to you?" It was almost as though she was blaming him for this, though he knew that wasn't the case.

Though in response, the only thought he had was, 'Lala.' Of course, she couldn't hear him either, he knew this. Albeit, he was still waiting to be told what he was.

It was almost always her fault when something happened, but he couldn't ever be angry at her. She never meant any actual harm, and a decent number of the time, it was for his sake.

Not that he was ever happy about the situation either.

info.brief_description: The cast of To-Love-Ru are about to spice things up in Rito's town.
info.description:
Welcome to my newest interactive on writing.com! For this one I chose To-Love-Ru, a popular manga that currently runs in Japan in Weekly Shonen Jump.

The story is a simple one: a beautiful alien princess named Lala Deviluke runs away from her arranged marriage and winds up on Earth. There she stays with a high school boy named Rito Yuuki and his sister. Rito wants to confess his feelings for his long-time crush Haruna Sairenji, but accidentally winds up addressing the words to Lala instead. The result causes Lala to see with her "boyfriend", eventually making herself a lab/room in his own closet for he to stay in. There she makes many different kinds of inventions, some of which have caused several effects to both Rito and the people he knows at school. In the past these have included shrinking, transgendered, and even animal transformations.

Because of the many different possibilities of transformation the series possesses, this is partially why I chose to use To-Love-Ru for my newest anime interactive.

Here are the rules:

1.) No sex/vore. Period. The grand majority of the cast are teenagers. As such, no rape either. Flirting and even insertion is fine.
2.) Rito can die, but he must revived by story's end.
3.) Please name all chapter titles.
4.) All entries must be at least one paragraph long.
5.) Please write in third person. (i.e. "Lala bought milk.")

So basically, no vore or sex, really. Add anything else you like, and enjoy!
